# Lists Test

This document tests numbered and bulleted lists.

## Unordered List

- First item
- Second item
- Third item

## Ordered List

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Nested Lists

- Parent item one
  - Nested item A
  - Nested item B
- Parent item two
  - Nested item C
  - Nested item D

## Mixed Nested Lists

1. First ordered item
   - Unordered sub-item A
   - Unordered sub-item B
2. Second ordered item
   - Unordered sub-item C
   - Unordered sub-item D

## List with Formatting

- Item with **bold text**
- Item with *italic text*
- Item with `inline code`

Text after the lists.
